content.html: @JamieTanna thanks for the "lock before suspend" systemd service. When using with xlock, it needs Type=exec, not Type=forking. Otherwise systemd waits for xlock to exit before doing the suspend. (Comments led me to think otherwise.)
content.value: @JamieTanna thanks for the "lock before suspend" systemd service.  When using with xlock, it needs Type=exec, not Type=forking.  Otherwise systemd waits for xlock to exit before doing the suspend.  (Comments led me to think otherwise.)
